meanings.definition: To live in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: I woon in a cozy house by the lake.
meanings.sent2: She wooned in the city for many years before moving to the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to woon in the shoebox instead of the expensive bed.
meanings.sent4: After the storm, the birds wooned in the trees once again.
meanings.sent5: The family of rabbits wooned happily in the burrow they had dug.

meanings.sent1: Their woon was a small cottage in the woods.
meanings.sent2: The cozy woon had a beautiful garden in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The treehouse became the children's favorite woon for their secret meetings.
meanings.sent4: The old castle stood as a majestic woon on top of the hill.
meanings.sent5: The underwater cave served as a mysterious woon for the sea creatures.
